alert.note: Alert for White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 3:57PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern White, Warrick, southern Gibson, northern Vanderburgh, northern Posey and south central Pike Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 356 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Folsomville to near New Harmony. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Folsomville around 400 PM CDT. Cynthiana around 410 PM CDT. Blairsville around 415 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Darmstadt. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 14 and 26. Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 1 and 54. Interstate 64 in Illinois between Mile Markers 124 and 130. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
